level.heading: Reports.
level.text: The Department of Employment Services shall submit quarterly reports, until January 1, 1997, on the effectiveness of outplacement services.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Merit system, effective date provisions, see § 1-636.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-78
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-78, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-624.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-98
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-98, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-624.01.
